noteR.para: These steps are carried out on two sides of the vehicle.

procedure.title: STEERING WITHOUT PULL COMPENSATION, driving in a STRAIGHT LINE.

procstep.para: Centre the steering wheel and fit a flywheel immobiliser.
Remove the wheel.
Control the clearance of the steering by exerting, on the track rod, translational movements at a high frequency in the direction of the arrow.
If a clearance is detected:

ul.li: remove the track rod nut,
remove the clips from the gaiter,
move the track rod gaiter to access the axial ball joint.

procstep.para: Pinch the ball joint.
Carry out movements in translation in the direction of the arrows.
If a clearance in the ball joint is detected, remove the track rod track rod end housing: removal - refittingGIEMR-000125.
Check the clearance of the axial ball joint:

ul.li: use your thumb to check contact with the ball joint,
tighten the rod by hand,
carry out movements in translation in the direction of the arrows.

procstep.para: If no clearance is detected:

ul.li: refit the gaiter,
refit new clips.

procstep.para: If clearance in the ball joint is detected:

ul.li: replace the track rod axial ball joint steering axial ball joint linkage : removal - refittingGIEMR-000267,
tighten the wheel alignment adjusting lock nut,
tighten the track rod nut.

procstep.para: Control the clearance of the steering by exerting, on the track rod, translational movements at a high frequency in the direction of the arrow.
If clearance is detected and the track rod has not been replaced, replace the track rod.
Check the axle geometry front and rear axles: checkGIEMR-002183.

procedure.title: STEERING with PULL COMPENSATION, driving in a STRAIGHT LINE.
Check position "0" on the steering wheel:

procstep.para: Set the wheels straight ahead,
Turn the steering wheel fully to the left and count the number of turns,
Set the wheels straight ahead,
Turn the steering wheel fully to the right and count the number of turns,
Set the wheels straight ahead,
The number of turns of the steering wheel must be identical.

procedure.title: Using the diagnostic tool, check the different parameters of the steering system:

procstep.para: Connect the diagnostic tool:

ul.li: select the "Power-assisted steering computer",
check the different parameters and statuses of the steering system,

li.para: check that there are no faults.

procedure.title: Check the condition of the AXLE ASSEMBLY:

procstep.para: Position the vehicle on a liftvehicle : towing and liftingGIEMR-002447.
Check the condition of the following components:

ul.li: track rods and axial ball joint linkages, refer to Section 1 STEERING WITHOUT PULL COMPENSATION, DRIVING IN A STRAIGHT LINE.
subframe,
lower arm rubber bushes,
lower arm ball jointsfront half shaft lower arm ball joint : checkGIEMR-001962,
shock absorbers,
the tire size,
the tire inflation pressure,
Put the vehicle in the VODM position (vehicle in running order)underbody height : adjustment valueGIEMR-001440,
tank full,
vehicle empty (without luggage etc.).

procstep.para: Consult:

ul.li: the front axle geometry values front axle assembly: adjustment valueGIEMR-001004,
the rear axle geometry values rear axle assembly: adjustment valueGIEMR-001000,
Refer to the user manual for the geometry tester.

procstep.para: Check the geometry using the geometry tester.
If there is an inconsistency between the manufacturer's values and the measured values:

ul.li: Adjust the axles front and rear axles: checkGIEMR-002183.
